name: Booze Helper
description:
Fixes drinking sounds for ladies (no more old man groan).

Also returns glass flasks when the purified water is used in the brewing process.

Note that this will only utilize voice sets that have the drunken / moaning sounds.  If you are using CharEditLite the quiet ones are female 2, 3, and 8 and I just fixed the Silent option to be silent as well.

I could do a setting to make it more or less vocal if people want.  Maybe choose a random moan for the voice sets that don't have one, or make them all drink silently etc?

[b]Mod ID:  1877326722[/b]

Source at [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://github.com/Kharzette/ConanMods][img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhass/github_desktop_notifications/master/res/icons/GitHub-Mark-Light-64px.png[/img][/url]

changeNote: Better compatability with CharEditLite's silent voice option
author: Kharzette
